Event.eLetter: M'lord you're summond to attend a trial! An assembly of Kentish nobility, to resolve a dispute between Odo Bishop of Bayeux and Lanfranc, Archbishop of Canterbury.
Event.eLetterTwo: Archbishop Lanfranc has accused Bishop Odo, half brother to William the Conquerer and previously the Earl of Kent of defrauding the Church and crown, during his tenure as Earl!
Event.eLetterThree: Archbishop Lanfranc, and the men of Kent have found Odo Bishop of Bayeux guilty! The crown, and church will now be re-inbursed!
